import.stage-extraction-description: Extracting text from images and documents using OCR technology
import.stage-analysis-description: Analyzing medical content and extracting structured health data
import.processing-failed-try-again: Processing failed. Please try again or use individual file upload.
import.no-cached-files-warning: Original files are not available on this device. You can save without attachments, or finalize on the device where you started the import.

auth.title: Authentication
auth.magic-link-instruction: Sign in via magic link with your email below
auth.magic-link-sent: Magic link sent! Check your email and tap the link to sign in.
auth.invalid-email: Please enter a valid email address
auth.unexpected-error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
auth.no-auth-code: No authentication code found. Please try again.
auth.auth-timed-out: Authentication timed out. Please try again.
auth.please-wait: Please wait while we log you in.
auth.no-auth-params: No authentication parameters found in URL.
auth.beta-in-beta: Mediqom is currently in beta. To get access:
auth.beta-step-apply: Apply for beta access on our

auth.beta-review-message: Your beta application is being reviewed. We'll email you within 48 hours once approved.
auth.beta-check-spam: Check your spam folder if you don't see our email.
auth.beta-not-approved: Your beta application was not approved. If you believe this is an error, please contact us at

med.title: Mediqom - Electronic Health Records
med.description: Mediqom helps you with your medical reports management. Just scan your medical report and Mediqom will help you understand it:
med.max-profiles-reached: You have reached the maximum number of profiles.

app.tagline: Medical Intelligence to Query, Organize, and Monitor
app.name: mediqom

document.add-prompt: Do you want to add "{title}" to our chat?

profile.switch-prompt: You switched to {profileName}'s profile. Do you want to reset the chat context?

greetings.patient: Hello! I'm here to help you understand your medical information and support you through your healthcare journey. Feel free to ask me about your health records, symptoms, or any questions you might have about your care.
greetings.clinical: Hello! I'm here to assist with clinical analysis of {profileName}'s medical profile. I can help analyze patterns, suggest differential considerations, and provide insights based on the available medical data.

searchDocuments.prompt: AI wants to search your medical documents for: {query}

getProfileData.prompt: AI wants to access your basic health profile information

queryMedicalHistory.prompt: AI wants to query your {category} history

getAssembledContext.prompt: AI wants to gather comprehensive medical context about: {query}

language.title: Language
language.description: Choose your preferred language for the interface

profile.title: Profile Information
profile.description: Manage your personal, insurance, contact, and health information
profile.edit-full: Edit your complete profile including personal information, insurance details, contacts, and health data.
profile.save-error: Failed to save profile. Please try again.

encryption.title: Encryption
encryption.key-available: Your encryption key is automatically available.
encryption.success-passkey: Your data is now protected with your passkey.
encryption.success-passphrase: Your data is now protected with your passphrase.
encryption.error-verify: Verification failed. Please check your credentials.
encryption.error-passkey-create: Failed to create passkey. Please try again.
encryption.error-browser-support: Your browser does not support passkey PRF.

data.title: Data Management
data.export-error: Failed to export data. Please try again.
data.delete-confirm: Are you sure you want to permanently delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
data.delete-error: Failed to delete account. Please try again.

credits.title: Credits
credits.description: Mediqom is built with open source technologies and contributions from the community. Thank you to all contributors and maintainers.

onboarding.i-stored-or-remembered-the-passphrase-my: I stored or remembered the passphrase myself.
onboarding.if-you-loose-this-passphrase-it-can-neve: If you loose this passphrase it can never be recovered and all your data will be lost. We suggest to keep it in password manager securely

privacy.i-dont-need-to-store-it: I don't need to store it
privacy.passphrase-is-not-saved-in-password-mana: Passphrase is not saved in password manager
privacy.passphrase-is-saved-in-password-manager: Passphrase is saved in password manager
privacy.your-passphrase-is-not-yet-set: Your passphrase is not yet set.
privacy.convenience-backup: We securely store an encrypted backup
privacy.zero-knowledge-only-you: Only you can decrypt your data
privacy.zero-knowledge-no-access: Server has NO access to your keys
privacy.passkey-description: Use Face ID, Touch ID, or Windows Hello. No passphrase to remember.
privacy.passphrase-description: Create a strong master passphrase. Store in password manager or memorize.
privacy.passkey-not-supported: Passkey PRF is not supported in this browser
privacy.passkey-setup-instructions: Click the button below to create a passkey using your device's biometric authentication.
privacy.passphrase-setup-instructions: Create a strong passphrase or use the generated one below.
privacy.recovery-document-intro: Download your recovery document. This is your ONLY way to recover access if you lose your passphrase or passkey.
privacy.confirm-saved: I have saved the recovery document
privacy.confirm-understand: I understand this is my only way to recover
privacy.recovery-warning: Anyone with this key can access your data. Store it securely offline.
privacy.using-passkey: Your data is protected with your passkey.
privacy.using-passphrase: Your data is protected with your passphrase.
privacy.convenience-explanation: Your data is encrypted and we can help you recover access if needed.

onboarding.to-set-your-own-custom-passphrase: To set your own custom passphrase,
onboarding.total-privacy-lets-you-add-another-layer: Total privacy lets you add another layer of privacy by encrypt all your data with a custom passphrase, that even the server does not know.
onboarding.your-data-are-currently-stored-securely-: Your data are currently stored securely on our backend in encrypted form.

profile.name: Name

documents.confirm-remove: Are you sure you want to remove this document?

upgrade.please-upgrade-your-subscription-to-cont: Please upgrade your subscription to continue.

recover.title: Account Recovery
recover.enter-key-description: Enter your recovery key to regain access to your encrypted data.
recover.help-text: Your recovery key is in the recovery document you downloaded during setup.
recover.invalid-key-format: Invalid recovery key format. Please check and try again.
recover.verification-failed: Recovery verification failed. Please check your email and recovery key.
recover.choose-new-method: Choose a new unlock method for your account.
recover.passkey-description: Use biometric authentication (Face ID, Touch ID, Windows Hello)
recover.passphrase-description: Create a new passphrase to protect your data
recover.setup-new-passkey: Click to set up a new passkey for your account.
recover.setup-new-passphrase: Create a new passphrase for your account.
recover.generate-new-recovery: Generate a new recovery document. Your old recovery key will no longer work.
recover.confirm-saved: I have saved the new recovery document
recover.success-description: Your account has been recovered successfully. You can now log in with your new credentials.

blocks.start-recording: Start recording your session by clicking the microphone button.

empty.select-node-diagram: Select a node or link from the diagram to view details

end.description: What would you like to do with this session?

share.title: Share {title}
share.description: Sharing will create an encrypted store on our server for the selected medical record. The records can be accessed via generated link and password.
share.public-key-info: Your records will be stored on our server encrypted. {name} has configured a Public Key and we will use it to encrypt the records. We will not be able to access your records.
share.password-info: Your records will be stored on our server encrypted. You have to create a custom password, that you will be able to share with your contact. We will not be able to access your records.
share.encrypting-uploading: Encrypting keys and uploading data to the server
share.password-note: Please note, that the password is kept only in your app. You have to share it with your contact.

billing.upgrade-subtitle: Unlock more features and scan capacity for your medical documents
billing.scan-credits-description: Purchase additional scans that never expire. Credits are used after your base scans are depleted.
billing.subscription-updated: Your subscription has been updated. Thank you for your purchase!
billing.generic-error: Something went wrong. Please try again.
billing.payment-success: Payment successful! Your subscription has been updated.
billing.payment-canceled: Payment was canceled. No changes were made.
billing.no-subscription: No subscription found. Get started with a plan.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.what-are-scans-answer: A scan is used each time you import a medical document for AI-powered analysis and data extraction.
faq.credits-expire-answer: No, purchased scan credits never expire and accumulate across purchases.
faq.base-scans-reset-answer: Your base scan allowance resets on your subscription anniversary date. Unused base scans do not carry over.
faq.cancel-subscription: How do I cancel my subscription?
faq.cancel-subscription-answer: Click 'Manage Billing' to access the Stripe customer portal where you can cancel, change payment method, or view invoices.
